=== James Saveker ===

==== About me: ====

I am James Saveker (a.k.a Jimbo / Jim / Jimmy), living in London, UK and using Ubuntu on the desktop. I'm a self confessed geek and a Free Software and GNU/Linux advocate. I research and develop on Free/Open Source Software whilst not at work.
